TopicTitle: (MAC OS X) Full screen mode showing black screen only - music playing

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I can run Kerbal space program only in windowed mode, i would love to have full screen though.

System: OSX Snow Leopard - fully updated.

Kerbal: Version 0.90.0 Beta / just downloaded 

All resolutions works in windowed mode - none of them works for full screen - it turns to black screen with no graphics.

update: i am running macbook pro 2010 13inch.

update 2: problem is caused by external full HD monitor which is set as primary one. If i unplug this monitor. KSP runs well on both 0.25 and 0.9 version 

kek

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-26T19:05:31Z" title="02/26/2015 07:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 26, 2015</time> by lokinghon**
  
new things discovered

If it is fine in windowed mode, have you considered setting the window resolution to match your desktop and using the -popupwindow command line argument? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm sorry to say I remember this issue affecting [thread=99063]one other user[/thread]. I asked her/him to post a formal bug report since minimum requirements do still say OS X 10.6 or higher and it appeared to be a new issue with KSP 0.25. Looks like that never happened.

I can't test it myself as my 10.6 machine doesn't come close to the minimum requirements and I don't have the right cable adapters.
